database module¶

database.create_metadata_db(json_path, db_path)[source]¶

Create SQLite database with metadata from JSONL file. :param json_path: path to JSONL file with metadata :type json_path: str :param db_path: path to SQLite database :type db_path: str

Returns:

None

database.get_metadata(product_id, db_path)[source]¶

Get metadata for a product from the database. :param product_id: ASIN of product :type product_id: str :param db_path: path to SQLite database :type db_path: str

Returns:

metadata for quered product

Return type:

metadata (json)

Cluster-based social network analysis for review graph
